Welcome to Wednesday's live moderation of “What’s Going On in This Graph?”  Today’s graph displays how frequently young adults communicate with their parents.  Note that the data does not include young adults who do not communicate with their parents.

From 9 am – 2 pm E.T. today, share with us your responses online for the four questions.  If your notice includes a claim, please back it up with evidence that supports your claim.  By Friday morning, we’ll reveal the free link to the online article that included this graph, shout outs for some of the catchiest headlines and more.  

You can get a link to your response to share with your teacher and classmates by clicking the response box below your response “Email me when my comment is published.”  

There is one more graph this school year, which will be released by Friday, May 3.  The topic – HOTTER summers.
